description: '''Brant Bjork''' (born March 19, 1973) is an American musician, singer, songwriter and record producer. He is best known as the drummer and founder of the influential Californian [[stoner rock]] band [[Kyuss]]. Bjork has also been a member of [[Fu Manchu (band)|Fu Manchu]], [[Mondo Generator]] and [[Vista Chino]], the latter with former Kyuss members [[John Garcia (singer)|John Garcia]] and [[Nick Oliveri]]. He is currently the frontman and co-founder of the stoner rock [[power trio]], [[St√∂ner]]. Bjork is one of the more notable figures in the stoner rock and [[Palm Desert scene]] and maintains a prolific solo career with over a dozen released albums.
